description: Defines the HtmlGenerator class responsible for generating an HTML report with embedded styling and scripting for visualizing file access data, including methods for report generation and error retrieval.

classes.name: HtmlGenerator
classes.description: A class providing static methods to generate an HTML report visualizing file access and process interactions, with embedded CSS and JavaScript for interactivity.

methods.name: generate_html_report
methods.description: Creates an HTML report file with styled content and embedded scripts for visualization, returning success status.

methods.name: get_last_error
methods.description: Returns the last error message encountered during report generation.
